name: Sheepherder
description:
This is a silly game made for Trijam #187 with the theme Stay Here Forever, and you play as a sheepherding dog  that is trying to keep sheep inside the plot of land, but their fences surrounding them are decaying! If a sheep escapes(be careful, they're really quick!) you lose. 

Controls

WASD to move, SPACE to bark, and the bar at the top is a cooldown timer.

this was a fun idea, so i think I will update it.

this took between 3:00:00 and 3:15:00 to make

i would not suggest playing fullscreen

Sounds:
